name: Cuco - El pirata ambidiestro
description:
This game is just a small project made by five spanish students. We wanted to try and prove our new acquired skills in Unity, even if we have been using it only for two months. It is entirely made by us (except the music).

No payment or donations here, we just want to share our work and see some feedback!

We are aware of some issues this game has, but anyway, feel free to report anything you see.
